feed.title: Mount Carleton (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mount Carleton (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:56 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22 except minus 28 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22 except minus 28 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 24 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to snow at times heavy near midnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High minus 1.
